item.title: Lab Notes
item.description: Lab Notes # Lab 5, Due 11/14/2021 23:59 EST Quick Links # https://developer.android.com/studio/install https://developer.android.com/training/basics/firstapp/creating-project https://piazza.com/class/kti52spsvua71f?cid=329 (For AMD CPUs) https://piazza.com/class/kti52spsvua71f?cid=336 (For M1 Mac Users) Files For Submission # Do not submit any code, only these screenshots are enough. Screenshot of the main activity (EditText with SEND button) Screenshot of the display message activity (with the message you typed earlier)

item.title: Project Notes
item.description: Navinn’s Declassified B07 Project Survival Guide # Final Project, Due 12/06/2021, 20% of Final Grade ðŸ‘‰ Quick Links # Resources to work on the project, make sure to start working ASAP!
